storyInfo: Ifrit and Skyfire happen upon Shaw, who is inspecting the fire safety equipment in the hallway. The two of them learn how Shaw feels about her profession as a firefighter.

attributes.content: It'sokay... Everything'sfine... Calmdown... I'mnotnervous atall... Phew...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: It's no goooood! WhatdoIdo? Tomorrow's thesecondlecture!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Ican'tgetmydraftfixed. G-Gottamakeitsimple andeasytounderstand. Alsogotta becareful thateachsentence isn'tmorethan twentywordslong. Notlikelasttime.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Istillhaven'tfinished checkingmyequipment fortheday, andIstill haven'tputmyreporttogether. Ican'tdothisanymore. Ican'tkeep neglectingmyduties!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: You know, you can go apologize any time. Why do I have to go with you?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Don't tell me you're shy. Please, I've had enough of your jokes.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Huh? Apologize? Me? I... Ugh, this sucks. Anyway, that's not what's happening!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Then let go of me. Stop pulling.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: No way! Dammit! If it wasn't for Silence and the Doctor's complaining, I wouldn't be wasting my time with all this.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I was just trying to get a barbecue going. It wasn't supposed to turn out like that... Urgh, this is bullshit. The notes I borrowed from Ice Cube are all wet...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So you are actually trying to study?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: W-What're you giggling for? I'm allowed to study! Besides, you were there setting everything on fire with me just the same. Why aren't they giving you an earful?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't you lump me in with you... That was an accident! I didn't think I'd lose control all of a sudden!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Hey, keep your voice down! There she is...!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It'swellventilatedhere, theemergencyexit's notblocked, theemergencylight's working, andall firesuppressionequipment's functioningproperly.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Phew, lookslikeIcan finishcheckingeverything beforedinner. Afterthat, Igot thisseason's fireriskanalysis tofinish, andIgotta handoutbrochures...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Ohno! Notenoughtime! WhatdoIdo? I'mnotdonewith tomorrow'slectureeither. I'msogonnamessupagain... *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Hey, I'm talking to you! What are you ignoring me for?! That's rude!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You're a fine one to talk, Ifrit...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Uh! Ohno! Didyousetsomething onfireagain?! That'sweird. Ididn't hearanyalarms.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Wait, no, calm down already. There's no fire!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, I'm telling you, stop...! Why are you running? There's no fire!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Why did you assume there was a fire as soon as you saw us?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: And just what are you trying to say?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: How are you not done with this dumb back-and-forth yet?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, shorty. What are you up to? What's the rush?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So what are you doing? What's with all the papers? It's all packed with words... and why are these crossed out?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, these? They'retheinspectionsheets foreachsection oftheship... EverythingIcrossedoff hasbeeninspected. Everything'sfinethere.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Huh? You gotta check every last one of these places?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Damn, sounds like such a pain. And you got so many of these forms.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You've got quite a few of these too. A tough job indeed.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Hey, what about this? What's this stack?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey! Stopit, don'tmessthatup! That'sa reportIgottagiveto ClosureandtheDoctor! Ihaven'tfinishedwritingityet...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Don't you get tired working like this every day?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I couldn't stick with it. All the inspections, all the reports. That sounds so boring. Isn't there something... you know... cooler?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Like, say... uh... I guess you look kinda cool when you use that fire extinguisher. Got me all wet last time, though.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (That's a rather roundabout way to compliment someone... Don't tell me she believes this makes for an apology!)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Butthefactis puttingoutfires isonlyatinyfraction oftheworkwedo. Mostofthetime, wehelpfindmissingitems ordoinspectionwork...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Firepreventionisn't allthatfun tolearnabout, andnobodylikesit whenwekeepmaking apointoutofit. Alsowehavesomeregulations thatweremade outofsafetyconcerns, butIknowthey canbeabittoomuch forday-to-daylife.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: LasttimeIgavealecture atthelocalprimaryschool, andthekidsthere weren'tinterestedinlisteningto whatIhadtosay. Theyallranaway beforeIevengot halfwaythrough...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Oh, ohh... So you do know that, huh...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Whoa! W-Why'd you raise your voice?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Evenhelping acitizentakethering offherfingerwhen itgetsstuck ismeaningfulwork, andsomeone'sgotta doit.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: So you are the one responsible for this operation?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Relax. There is no need to be so tense.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's all thanks to you and everyone else at the fire department that there were no causalities in this rescue operation. On behalf of all of Lungmen, please accept my thanks.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is there anything you want for your reward? Money, an extended holiday? You deserve it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Ifatallpossible, Iwouldalsolike anincreasein firesafetyinformationsessions atschoolsacross alldistricts...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Ibelieve furthereducationin firesafety canhelplower fireoccurrences aswellasinjuries, deaths, andpropertyloss! P-Pleasegivethissomethought!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Very well, I'll agree to this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: However, I also expect to see an acceptably feasible proposal for an information campaign of this scale.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And since you requested it, it falls on you to put together this proposal. If you want to see it happen soon, I'm afraid you won't be getting any of that vacation time for your reward.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I took a quick glance at your file and work logs before our meeting.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Your performance in school was impeccable, and I'm confident you could find yourself a much better line of work, if you wished.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As for your current job, it seems you are unparalleled in the field. Your logs show that, up until today, you've been volunteering your own time to patrol on the weekends for the past two months?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Relax, this is nothing formal. If you would prefer not to answer, you have the right. This is just my own personal curiosity asking.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What drives you to go so far?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: WhenIwasakid, therewasastorenotfaraway frommyschool. Ilovedthatplace. WheneverIdidsomethingright, myparentswould takemethere tobuysomenuts asareward.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: AndI'dtaketherewardstickers Iearnfromclassand stickthemonthewallthere. Whenmyrewardboard wasfullofstickers, theoldmanatthestore wouldgiveme asmallbagofnuts.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: This must be gruesome work to do day after day.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This isn't an official inquiry. You may answer honestly.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Can you bear with it and remain steadfast to your position?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Lungmen is lucky to have a young woman like you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Now put your proposal together. I will arrange for a liaison to reach out. If you are going to do it, then give it your best effort... Do not come to regret your decision!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I thank all of you, for all that you have done for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Aslongaswekeepup safetyinspections... andaslongas everyoneknows theirsafetypreceautions and whattolookoutfor, wecanactually keepfiredamage toaminimum!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: That's true. For example, never set up a charcoal barbecue grill indoors...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Also, ifyourequipment's wornout, butitgoesunnoticed duringinspections andnevergetsreplaced, thenyoumight findyourselfunable touseitwhenyou needitthemost, andwhatcould've beenaneasily solvedproblem insteadturnsinto ahugedisaster.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Like, say, thisfireextinguisher... Look, ifthebuttonhereisstuck, youwouldn'tbe abletotakethefireextinguisherout.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Andtakealookhere. Doyounormally noticethisleverhere? Ifthisisbroken, youwon'tbeableto usethefirebarrierwall tostopthefire fromspreading.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Oh, I never noticed that little thing...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Well, what am I supposed to do?! You know how fast you talk? I can't get half of what you say!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Thistime, I'llmakesureI'mwell-prepared, andI'llmakesureallofyou willcometoknow firesafetyandprevention likethebackofyourhands.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Start by getting your talking speed under control!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Actually, Dr.Kal'tsitandAmiya approvedmyapplication rightinthebeginning toinstallfireequipment allthroughouttheship.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Butaslongaswemakesure theequipmentisoperatingproperly andthateverybody knowshowtouseit, youwon'tneedtocometome whensomethingdoeshappen.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Itdoesn'tmatterwhetheryou'reat RhodesIslandorelsewhere. Wherethere'safire, there'salways anextinguishercloseby, andyoucanquicklyputitoutyourself.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: With these cans and stuff? Now that you mention it, I do see them all over the place.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But if you're gonna put it like that, can't we just get Casters like MuMu to use their Arts to put the fire out? Why go through all the trouble?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: IfIcanmakefiresafety commonknowledge hereatRhodesIsland byholdingmorelectures, wecancompletely eradicatedangerslike usingunauthorizedelectronics!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Hey, hold up. Why does it feel like you're yelling at me?! I told you last time I won't do that again!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's true that all my enemies burn to cinders whenever I use my Arts on them.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Alotofoperators can'tevenget anywherenearyou, andiftheydon't putout theflamesyourelease, itcouldlead tomuchworsedamage... Justlikethattime intheforest!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Anyway, ratherthanputtingoutfires afterthefact, Iwouldrather weputastop toallthefiresattheirsource!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Wow, hey... That's actually a pretty cool thing to say.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If that's where your heart is, then you'd better do a good job! I'm going to that lecture tomorrow, and don't you dare disappoint me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But, hmm. Remember the podium last time? I couldn't even see you behind it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: That's not gonna fly... Oh, I know! I'll ask Closure to do something about it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Just let her do her thing. Perhaps she'll actually figure out something nice.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: So how is your lecture coming along?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Imanagedtogetitwritten, butIjustdon'tthink it'sgoodenough... Everyonesaid theydidn'tknow whatIwastalkingabout lasttimetoo...
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Hmph, if they can't figure it out, it just goes to show the level they are at. That being said...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Okay, let me take a look at your draft. I don't mind helping you with some minor edits.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I'm telling you I don't mind! It has absolutely nothing to do with me being sorry for setting the hallway on fire last time! Don'tyoudaregetthewrongidea!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Castertraininggrounds re-inspection... thesimulationcabins... thecanteen... Okay, allofit's takencareof... Good.
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Sorry, it'sallmyfault! Iwasn'tpayingattention... Areyouhurt? DoIneedto takeyoutotheclinic?!
attributes.name: Shaw

attributes.content: Oh... I'm fine. You don't need to apologize...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What about you... Are you with the Lungmen Fire Department?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I knew it! I got the right person...! I didn't expect to bump into you here!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Please, don't be so polite. You can call me Waai Fu. I saw you on TV before.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm not sure if you remember, but it was that accident caused by the heater that's against regulations? I think it was a pretty big deal. Master Wei even took it upon himself to do some fire safety PSAs.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: One of my classmates was in that very building, and she kept telling me it's all thanks to you firefighters that everyone's still alive.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: All of them are really thankful for everything you've done, and they've been paying extra care to the safety code. The city's awareness campaign was right after that... I learned so much because of that.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I heard you led the rest of the firefighters at the forefront in that rescue operation. You really left an impression, with how cool and brave you were.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Don't be so humble! That's just how amazing you are!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oh, right... I forgot to mention. My classmate is looking to join the fire department, and she's prepping for the exam now.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: That's perfect! I know she's got to be studying so hard for her exam day after day. I bet she'll be so jealous if she finds out I met you here!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Not at all. It's no exaggeration.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It may seem like no big deal, but she told me it was a miracle that everyone made it out alive and unharmed.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Shaw, you're a hero to her.
attributes.name: Waai Fu
